main event: A bright, rapidly moving object was observed by engineer/security personnel at the Navajo Ordnance Depot in Arizona.
interesting points: The object did not maneuver and disappeared high on the back to the horizon.
The object was estimated to be approximately 3-5 miles from the viewers.
The object was a round, yellow-red orange object with a bright light and no exhaust.
The object was seen from a Santa Fe engine at 7:59 PM.
The object was observed at an elevation of 10-20-30 degrees and 50-60 degrees to the right front of the engine.
sighted object: a round, yellow-red orange object with a bright light and no exhaust
